name: externally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the outside of something, or that is on or comes from the outside: Externally the house is in need of repair. Externally she appeared calm, but inside she was furious. See
external
More examplesFewer examplesIf the relevant data already exists externally, you can import it.Airline telephones, on the other hand, transmit radio signals to and from antennas mounted externally on the aircraft.Externally administered assessments tied to standards shift the focus of teaching to test-related information.
